price: 62. Jie tarė: „Ar tu esi tas, kuris padarė tai mūsų dievams, Ibrahimai (Abraomai)?“
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
